content.query:
use nyc_taxi_ldw
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.taxi_zone2
        (  LocationID SMALLINT,
            Borough VARCHAR(15),
            Zone VARCHAR(50),
            service_zone VARCHAR(15))
    WITH (
        LOCATION = 'raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = nyc_tax_src,
       FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format1
       
    );
